Reviews.Title: Nice Microscope!!
Reviews.Author: David Ramos Jr. "Dee"
Reviews.Content: After checking out a few other USB microscopes I had ordered a microscope reasonably priced and looked to be quality. After receiving it, the microscope would not display an image on my Mac and turned out to be a dud, others had complained of the same thing. THAT was not THIS microscope!! This microscope was also reasonably priced and is of great quality. The LEDs dim with a brightness dial and the microscope zooms in extremely well. I would recommend this microscope to Mac users for sure. It comes with its own Mac program but can easily be used with Photobooth. There is one qualm I have which is the button on the microscope. I have a feeling a PC user may be able to snap shots with it but it doesn't work with my Mac. I really don't see that as a major negative though and would say this microscope is a great little investment.

Reviews.Title: Cobra Digital DPS-2100 Digital USB Microscope
Reviews.Author: mark thompson
Reviews.Content: Works good when usb makes connection , have play w/ usb cable to make connection , tried on 2 different pcs
